name: COREplus
description:
■CORE CONCEPT

COREplus is a rhythm game taking inspiration from 2008-2012's indie classics, such as BIT.TRIP CORE, Audiosurf and many others.

■CORE GAMEPLAY

Play using either a keyboard or a controller.
Keyboard:
 - [A], [W] and [D] to select lanes
 - [ARROW LEFT], [ARROW RIGHT] to hit lanes
 - [LSHIFT] to hit scratch notes
Controller:
 - [DPAD LEFT], [UP], [RIGHT] to select lanes
 - [X], [B] to hit lanes
 - [Y], [A] to hit both selected lanes at the same time
 - [LB], [RB] to hit scratch notes
It is recommended to check out the `HOW TO PLAY` section in the main menu first.

■CORE IDEA

As humanity once again finds itself in a point of no return, they [seek guidance] from the [CORE] of the universe.
Being inactive for countless years, the [CORE] needs to be [revived].
[signals] must be used.

■CORE DETAILS

As the game is in active development, only a playable demo is available, featuring one[two...?] of the levels to be in the final game.
Please report any bugs you find to me on Discord at cntrpl#4203

■ The level editor is currently a work-in-progress feature.
